name: Apple 1, 2e GS and Mac Plus Emulators launcher
name_original: Apple 1, 2e GS and Mac Plus Emulators launcher
description:
The Apple 1, iie and iigs Launcher all compressed in winrar unstuff it in C:\ folder. Run pressing the red icon with flash AEMUS ][-PLUS

added a long beep sound to the launcher while loading .

aemusiiiiis files

I have add the Mac Plus emulator to the launcher, in order to  be working the emulator need a Macintosh Plus .ROM file

add a Macintosh Plus .ROM file in MACINTOSH PLUS folder and rename it vmac.rom

I have also added THE BEGINNING Apple Computers  history i built for you!

Enjoy!
